title: Belhaven University STEM secures historic grants in Jackson MS
description: The recent grants, totaling $572,600, will fund research projects in fields ranging from biology to artificial intelligence.
content:
Belhaven University's School of Science and Mathematics has secured over half a million dollars in research funding.
This marks the first time the university has received faculty research grants.

title: India shouldn’t build AI models: The prize lies in using what exists to innovate and generate value
description: We should resist the temptation to create our own AI models from scratch. As with previous tech disruptions, greater scope for value generation lies in deploying artificial intelligence in unique new ways that could create whole new markets.
content: Amazon isn’t the only one—Microsoft, Google and IBM have all announced AI-related layoffs. According to a 2023 report by Niti Aayog, 1.5 million Indian jobs in the IT and business process outsourcing (BPO) sectors alone are expected to be at high ris... [5046 chars]

title: Stock Traders’ AI Wariness Threatens Seasonality Tailwinds
description: A year-end rally in US stocks seemed like a lock a few weeks ago amid relentless appetite for artificial intelligence-linked shares, solid earnings and a history of seasonal strength. Now Wall Street isn’t so sure.

title: What Is Agentic A.I., and Would You Trust It to Book a Flight?
description: Companies are racing to develop artificial intelligence tools that can make reservations for flights, hotels and more on your behalf. Here’s what to know.
content:
A bot may soon be booking your vacation.
Millions of travelers already use artificial intelligence to compare options for flights, hotels, rental cars and more. About 30 percent of U.S. travelers say they’re comfortable using A.I. to plan a trip. But... [525 chars]
